summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Generalized Wasserstein Dice Loss implementation, checking its behavior on 2‑D and 3‑D binary segmentation inputs, convergence properties, handling of various target data types, edge cases with empty classes, and script execution.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the loss function used in medical image segmentation models, ensuring it performs consistently across dimensions, data formats, and edge conditions.
